[Virtovo](http://www.virtovo.com) has been offering VPS service since 2013.  We've seen steady growth in our business and serve hundreds of happy customers.  We currently offer services out of Coresite, Miami and have a bandwidth blend of GTT and Cogent.  

We use Blesta for our billing/support and SolusVM for our VPS control. We've made modifications to our client area to enable near full control of your VPS from within the client area (including mounting ISOs, change boot priority, VNC console access, enabling PAE etc)

We use Blesta for our billing/support and SolusVM for our VPS control.
